ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Days since baseline
Assessment Point
Notes: D=MTA baseline assessment; 14=MTA 14 month assessment; E=MTA early termination assessment; B = MTA Pre-Baseline Screening Assessment (579/579); 09 = MTA 9 Month Assessment (530/530); 24=MTA 24 month assessment; LB=LNCG baseline assessment; 36=MTA and LNCG 3 year assessment; 72=MTA and LNCG 6 year assessment; 96=MTA and LNCG 8 year assessment; 03 = MTA 3 Month Assessment (438/687);120=MTA and LNCG 10 year assessment; 7= 7th Grade Assessment (221/276); 144 = MTA & LNCG 12 Month Assessment (578/578); 168 = MTA & LNCG 14 Month Assessment (585/585); 192 = MTA & LNCG 16 Month Assessment (505/505); C = MTA Pre-Baseline Screening Assessment (78/78)

ElementDescription: Active status
Notes: 0=Inactive-Data collected after the 14 month treatment phase/after early termination from treatment phase/prior to treatment phase; 1=Active-Data collected during the 14 month treatment phase while subject received originally assigned treatment regardless of degree of compliance; 2=Active-This is the last active assessment for subjects who were about to violate treatment arm by receiving alternate treatment; 3=Active-This is the last active assessment for subjects who were about to leave the study by moving away;4=Yes, Active; 5=No, Not Active

ElementDescription: Site
Subject type
Notes: 1=MTA randomized trial subject; 2=Local normative comparison group (LNCG) subject

ElementDescription: During the past year have you played cards in a casino or cardroom?
Notes: 1=Never; 2=1-5 times a year; 3=6-11 times a year; 4=1-3 days a month; 5=1-2 days a week; 6=3-6 days a week; 7=Daily

ElementDescription: During the past year have you played cards for money away from a casino?
Notes: 1=Never; 2=1-5 times a year; 3=6-11 times a year; 4=1-3 days a month; 5=1-2 days a week; 6=3-6 days a week; 7=Daily

ElementDescription: During the past year have you played the lottery?
Notes: 1=Never; 2=1-5 times a year; 3=6-11 times a year; 4=1-3 days a month; 5=1-2 days a week; 6=3-6 days a week; 7=Daily

ElementDescription: During the past year have you played pull tabs?
Notes: 1=Never; 2=1-5 times a year; 3=6-11 times a year; 4=1-3 days a month; 5=1-2 days a week; 6=3-6 days a week; 7=Daily

ElementDescription: During the past year have you bet on the outcome of a sporting event?
Notes: 1=Never; 2=1-5 times a year; 3=6-11 times a year; 4=1-3 days a month; 5=1-2 days a week; 6=3-6 days a week; 7=Daily

ElementDescription: During the past year have you bowled/shot pool/played golf/played some other game of skill for money?
Notes: 1=Never; 2=1-5 times a year; 3=6-11 times a year; 4=1-3 days a month; 5=1-2 days a week; 6=3-6 days a week; 7=Daily

ElementDescription: During the past year have you played slot machines/poker machines/or other gambling machines?
Notes: 1=Never; 2=1-5 times a year; 3=6-11 times a year; 4=1-3 days a month; 5=1-2 days a week; 6=3-6 days a week; 7=Daily

ElementDescription: During the past year have you played bingo for money
Notes: 1=Never; 2=1-5 times a year; 3=6-11 times a year; 4=1-3 days a month; 5=1-2 days a week; 6=3-6 days a week; 7=Daily

ElementDescription: During the past year have you bet on horses/dogs/other animals?
Notes: 1=Never; 2=1-5 times a year; 3=6-11 times a year; 4=1-3 days a month; 5=1-2 days a week; 6=3-6 days a week; 7=Daily

ElementDescription: During the past year have you wagered or gambled on high risk stock/commodities market/real eastate?
Notes: 1=Never; 2=1-5 times a year; 3=6-11 times a year; 4=1-3 days a month; 5=1-2 days a week; 6=3-6 days a week; 7=Daily

ElementDescription: During the past year have you played other forms of gambling?
Notes: 1=Never; 2=1-5 times a year; 3=6-11 times a year; 4=1-3 days a month; 5=1-2 days a week; 6=3-6 days a week; 7=Daily

ElementDescription: What is the largest amount of money you have gambled with on any one day in the past year?
Notes: 1=Never have gambled; 2=$1 or less; 3=more than $1 up to $10; 4=more than $10 up to $100; 5=more than $100 up to $1000; 6=more than $1000 up to $10000; 7=more than $10000

ElementDescription: When you gamble how often did you go back another day to win back money you lost?
Notes: 1=Never or never gamble; 2=some of the time I lost; 3=Most of the time I lose; 4=Every time I lost

ElementDescription: In the past year did you claim to be winning money gambling but weren't really?
Notes: 1=Never or never gamble; 2=yes less than half the time I lost; 3=Yes most of the time; 4=Yes

ElementDescription: Do you feel you have ever had a problem with betting money or gambling?
Notes: 1=No; 2=Yes but not in the past year; 3=Yes in the past year

ElementDescription: In the past year did you gamble more than you intended to?
In the past year did people criticize your betting or tell you that you had a gambling problem regardless of whether or not you thought it was true?
In the past year did you feel guilty about the way you gamble or what happens when you gamble?
In the past year did you feel like you would like to stop betting money or gambling but didnt think you could?
In the past year did you hide betting slips/lottery tickets/gambling money/IOUs/other signs of betting or gambling from your spouse/children/other important people in your life?
In the past year did you argue with people you live with over how you handle money?
In the past year did they money arguments center on your gambling?
In the past year did you borrow from someone and not pay them back as a result of your gambling?
In the past year did you lost time from work or school due to betting money or gambling?
If you borrowed money to gamble or pay gambling debts in the past year did you borrow it from household money?
If you borrowed money to gamble or pay gambling debts in the past year did you borrow it from your spouse?
If you borrowed money to gamble or pay gambling debts in the past year did you borrow it from other relatives or in laws?
If you borrowed money to gamble or pay gambling debts in the past year did you borrow it from banks/loan companies/credit unions?
If you borrowed money to gamble or pay gambling debts in the past year did you borrow it from credit cards?
If you borrowed money to gamble or pay gambling debts in the past year did you borrow it from loan sharks?
If you borrowed money to gamble or pay gambling debts in the past year did you borrow it from you cashed in stocks/bonds/other securities?
If you borrowed money to gamble or pay gambling debts in the past year did you borrow it from sold personal or family property?
If you borrowed money to gamble or pay gambling debts in the past year did you borrow it from borrowed on checking account?
If you borrowed money to gamble or pay gambling debts in the past year did you borrow it from a credit line with a bookie?
If you borrowed money to gamble or pay gambling debts in the past year did you borrow it from a credit line with a casino?
Total at risk score (mean score)
Total at risk score (total score)
Has your betting money ever caused any problems for you such as arguments with family and friends, or problems at school or work?
Have you borrowed money or stolen something in order to bet or to cover gambling activities?
